problems.title: Subarray with Given Sum
problems.description:
Write a program to find all subarrays with given sum from the given array. Print the start and end indices of each subarray.

Input Format:
First line contains n, the size of array.
Second line contains n space-separated integers.
Third line contains target, the target sum.

Output Format:
Print each subarray range in format "[start..end] -- { elements }", each on a new line. Elements should be space-separated.
hintsList: Use nested loops to check all possible subarrays starting from each index.
Use prefix sum technique to optimize the solution.
